items.name: What is Power Apps portals?
items.description: Power Apps makers can now create a powerful new type of experience: external-facing websites that allow users outside their organizations to sign in with a wide variety of identities, create and view data in Microsoft Dataverse, or even browse content anonymously.

items.name: Get started with Power Apps portals
items.description: This learning path introduces you to the Power Apps portals that can be quickly provisioned to serve a variety of different audiences and workloads. We also cover fundamentals of portal architecture, components, features, and tooling.

items.name: Create a starter portal
items.description: With the capability to build a portal in Power Apps, you can create a website for external and internal users enabling them to interact with data stored in Microsoft Dataverse.

items.name: Customize web parts using Portals Studio
items.description: Power Apps portals Studio allows makers to add and configure webpages, layout components, static content, custom CSS files, entity lists, and entity forms.
